Assessment: Uncertain etiology; possible pyogenic granuloma or atypical mole. No signs of melanoma.
Plan: Send photo to dermatologist via e-consultation.
Discuss removal options: freezing, excision, or scraping.
Schedule follow-up call Friday; patient prefers before 10 AM or after 3 PM.
